short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block social media distractions to stay focused and productive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of social media draining your time and energy? Saner Social Media helps you regain control by blocking distracting feeds while keeping essential features accessible. Whether for work or personal use, this extension boosts productivity and focus by replacing distractions with uplifting quotes.

Key Features:
üö´ Block distractions on 11 major platforms, including YouTube, X, Instagram, and TikTok, while keeping core features available.
‚è≥ Temporarily unblock sites as needed.
üåô Integrates seamlessly with dark mode on all sites.

This extension is free and open source. View the source code on GitHub: https://github.com/tobiasdalhof/sanersocialmedia

Inspired by News Feed Eradicator.
